title: Strengthening Learning Design and Language Education Competencies through International Virtual Internships

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic digital literacy and fundamental concepts of language education
context.additional_context: Learners are non-traditional students with limited physical mobility due to work and family responsibilities. The program emphasizes accumulating practical experience through project-based tasks, with smartphones as the primary learning tool.

learning_goals: One can complete a language education content design project in collaboration with an international team.
One can communicate and coordinate tasks in real-time using virtual collaboration tools.
One can develop culturally contextualized language education materials reflecting learner analysis results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
